tool.name: Tumor Mutation Burden

param.name: gnomad_af
param.label: GNOMAD VAF
param.help: GNOMAD VAF to filter list upon. Values greater than this will not be utilized.

param.name: m2_tlod
param.label: Mutect2 TLOD
param.help: M2 TLOD score to filter list upon. Values less than this will not be utilized.

param.name: min_ab
param.label: Variant Allele Balance
param.help: Variant allele frequency (balance) to filter list upon. Values less than this will not be utilized.

param.name: min_ab_pon_ov
param.label: Variant Allele Balance PON_OV
param.help: Variant allele frequency (balance) to filter list upon when FILTER contains PON_OV. Values less than this will not be utilized.

param.name: min_dp_fb
param.label: Min Depth FreeBayes
param.help: Minimum read depth for FreeBayes variants used in calculation. Values less than this will not be utilized.

param.name: min_dp_m2
param.label: Min Depth Mutect2
param.help: Minimum read depth for Mutect2 variants used in calculation. Values less than this will not be utilized.

param.name: seq_space
param.label: Genomic Target Size
param.help: Total genomic sequence target size, in Mb.

param.name: send_placeholder
param.label: Placeholder Value
param.help: Output this value, instead of the result of the TMB calculation.

data.name: variants
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: VCF
data.help: VCF containing variants used in the calculation

tool.help:
usage: calc_tmb.py [-h] [--infile INFILE [INFILE ...]] [--outfile OUTFILE] [--variants VARIANTS] [--gnomad_af GNOMAD_AF] [--m2_tlod M2_TLOD] [--min_ab MIN_AB] [--min_ab_pon_ov MIN_AB_PON_OV] [--min_dp_fb MIN_DP_FB] [--min_dp_m2 MIN_DP_M2] [--seq_space SEQ_SPACE] [--version]
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit --infile INFILE [INFILE ...] Input VCF --outfile OUTFILE Output JSON --variants VARIANTS Output list of variants --gnomad_af GNOMAD_AF GNOMAD VAF to filter list upon. Values greater than this will not be utilized. --m2_tlod M2_TLOD M2 TLOD score to filter list upon. Values less than this will not be utilized. --min_ab MIN_AB Variant allele frequency (balance) to filter list upon. Values less than this will not be utilized. --min_ab_pon_ov MIN_AB_PON_OV Variant allele frequency (balance) to filter list upon when FILTER contains PON_OV. Values less than this will not be utilized. --min_dp_fb MIN_DP_FB Minimum read depth for FreeBayes variants used in calculation. Values less than this will not be utilized. --min_dp_m2 MIN_DP_M2 Minimum read depth for Mutect2 variants used in calculation. Values less than this will not be utilized. --seq_space SEQ_SPACE Total genomic size of sequence targets, in Mb. --version show program's version number and exit
